verbs.description: [ARG0: The Wall Street Journal] [V: quotes] [ARG1: a Trump lawyer] [ARG2: saying that Michael Cohen is likely to flip] .
The Wall Street Journal quotes [ARG0: a Trump lawyer] [V: saying] [ARG1: that Michael Cohen is likely to flip] .
The Wall Street Journal quotes a Trump lawyer saying that [ARG1: Michael Cohen] [V: is] [ARG2: likely to flip] .
The Wall Street Journal quotes a Trump lawyer saying that [ARG1: Michael Cohen] is likely to [V: flip] .
